example.eg: Fish were darting beneath the surface of the lake.

dsense.name: beneath
dsense.guideword: figurative (of lower status than) (社会地位)

example.eg: The young man's parents worried that his friends were beneath him.
example.egtrans: 那位青年的父母担心他交了社会地位比自己的朋友。

example.eg: Beneath her rigid smile she was extremely angry.
example.egtrans: 在僵硬的微笑之下，她其实是勃然大怒的。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 表面背后, 表面之下

example.eg: The calm surface of the water hid the dangerous rocks beneath.
example.egtrans: 平静的水面下方隐藏着危险无比的岩礁。
